thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Prosecutors Consider Charging Iranian Cleric in German Hospital

author: Andrea Thomas
title: Prosecutors Consider Charging Iranian Cleric in German Hospital
text:
BERLIN—Germany’s top Federal prosecutor’s office said Thursday it saw no grounds to seek the arrest of a visiting senior Iranian justice official who critics say was responsible for crimes against humanity.
German media reported Tuesday that Mahmoud Hashemi Shahroudi, former head of Iran’s judiciary, who has been undergoing medical treatment in Hanover since last month, was preparing to leave Germany on Thursday.
Late...
